cc:Work.dc:title: Tracking chart for Expanded Alignments
cc:Work.dc:description: The Tracking chart for Expanded Alignments was created by Dawn M. Burge and expanded rules were written by Erick Edwards. Erick also designed the color scheme for the chart.

g.title: lawful with neutral tendencies and true good
neutral with lawful tendencies and true good
neutral with chaotic tendencies and true good
chaotic with neutral tendencies and true good

a.title: Lawful Good on D&D Alignment by easydamus

g.title: lawful with neutral tendencies and good
neutral with lawful tendencies and good

chaotic with neutral tendencies and good
